Coefficient Adjustment

Source: R/coef_adjustment.R
coefficient_adjustment.Rd

This function will adjust the stored coefficients to user defined values. In general, we advice not adjusting these coefficients. However, there are specific situations where adjusting stored coefficients to 0 (e.g., Crop, Urban Industrial, Hard Linear) may be appropriate.

Usage

coefficient_adjustment(model, coef = NULL, value = NULL)

Arguments

model

Vector defined as "Vegetation", "Soil", or "All" so the appropriate model is adjusted.

coef

Vector of characters that the user wishes to modify.

value

User defined value to be assigned to the specified coefficients. Adjustment is made across all boostraps.
